### Steps to reproduce

Nothing to reproduce here, but the file `lib/spack/spack/test/spec_yaml.py` could stand to be renamed to something more accurate since spack tries to serialize specs as json now instead of yaml.  One possibility is to rename it to `spec_serialization.py`.

Originally suggested by @alalazo in a review [comment](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/28504/files#r814029868) of #28504.


### Error message

No error message.

### Information on your system

Unrelated to any system.
title: Fix name of test module to better reflect purpose
